Name: Poly Party
About the game: Welcome to Poly Party! A game of games, still in development, but a lot to do! Play some board games and minigames in Party Mode. Roam and explore cities where you can buy, obtain, upgrade and customize cars, as well as work odd jobs, participate in missions, race, play arcade games, and more in Poly Mode. Race your cars in Racer Nation, where you can race in circuits, time trials, and events with various rewards! A lot to do so far but a lot more to come! Update: - a lot of stuff has changed, check out dhoodproductions.com for more info (NOTE: Is playable with mouse and keyboard, but Xbox controller is recommended)
Meta Title: Poly Party: Sep 1, 2020, Daniel Hood and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Poly Party? Check out the release date (Sep 1, 2020), developer insights from Daniel Hood, and a complete game summary.
